title: Cookdata
author: Cookdata
content: We have 3 newbies with unusual names with threads on B&H board, they haven't done anything that violates the community but something seems off about them. I wanted to find out and ask why they use such lengthy and scattered letters but Marvelman discovered this:Quote from: Marvelman on May 29, 2022, 08:39:50 PMQuote from: Cookdata on May 29, 2022, 08:20:10 PMQuote from: VoditiIjubavSaSusjedima on May 28, 2022, 07:51:33 AMHow well do you manage financial management?If you have Bitcoin assets which wallet do you think is safe so far?Wait, did you choose that username or you just feel like using dumb letters  His username loosely translated into English: "Make Love with Neighbors"Probably related to this member: SilovatiLijepuSusjedu (translated: "Violate a Beautiful Neighbor", but much more vulgar)I will report these members to the moderators, but I don't know if this is against the rules.I also search the names on google and the auto-translate detected they are Croatian and NorwegianSilovatiLijepuSusjedu ===>> In Croatian: Rape the Beautiful Neighbor.VoditiIjubavSaSusjedima====>> In Croatian: Make love to your neighbors.Saluttoutle Monde ====>> In Norwegian: Hi All The World.These are the 3 usernames, the last one doesn't sound offensive but looks similar to the first two and all were registered on the same day, the same time frame. Which could also belong to one person.VoditiIjubavSaSusjedima == Register on May 27, 2022, 05:52:51 PMSilovatiLijepuSusjedu == Register on May 27, 2022, 05:55:04 PMSaluttoutle Monde ==  Register on May 27, 2022, 06:19:27 PMThis is far from a coincidence.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Posts of VoditiIjubavSaSusjedimahttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400475.msg60240329#msg60240329QuoteHow well do you manage financial management?If you have Bitcoin assets which wallet do you think is safe so far?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400475.msg60250310#msg60250310Quotethank you good friends who are enthusiastic about commenting on my post.I am planning to implement bitcoin into my business. is every bitcoin transaction cheap p2p? any solution?Posts of SilovatiLijepuSusjeduhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400651.msg60250720#msg60250720Quotewhat should i do to improve my finances to be 2x better than before. i invested in bitcoin at a price of $42,000 and now the bitcoin price is $29,157.,if you were me what would you do and maybe i have a hard time accepting the harsh reality if i were you  Cryhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400651.msg60250801#msg60250801Quoteso this is what happens if I take 50% of my remaining bitcoin and leave the rest for the long term (hopefully to cover future losses) ,.what this better or not at all ., or is it better to just Hold on like people say?Posts of Saluttoutle MondeQuote from: Saluttoutle Monde on May 28, 2022, 03:43:25 PMnewbie often run into losses when investing in new projects.  ,i once bought new coins but i can't resell them. i think i have been cheated   what can you suggest to us and how to find out if the project is a scam? Is it true that new Coins can give big profits as people say on youtube channel?Quote from: Saluttoutle Monde on May 28, 2022, 03:43:25 PMnewbie often run into losses when investing in new projects.  ,i once bought new coins but i can't resell them. i think i have been cheated   what can you suggest to us and how to find out if the project is a scam? Is it true that new Coins can give big profits as people say on youtube channel?SilovatiLijepuSusjedu and Saluttoutle Monde both use ., in their posts, also they both use i instead of I. They are both asking questions. They are the same person in my opinion.VoditiIjubavSaSusjedima can also be an alt of SilovatiLijepuSusjedu and Saluttoutle Monde as the usernames looks similar and the registered date of the there accounts. I could have known if VoditiIjubavSaSusjedima topic is not locked. But the way he construct his English is better and he still use punctuation better than SilovatiLijepuSusjedu and Saluttoutle which are alts in my opinion.No one offends for now but their posts are kind of shit posts.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Cookdata on May 29, 2022, 09:50:35 PMThis is far from a coincidence.Far from it, but i don't think they can get into any trouble for the wording of their usernames or what it means, it does not explicitly relate to any user here or any person in real life, so who cares. They are also prolly alts, but still that is not against the rules of the forum, they can decide to register as many accounts as they like, the merit system handles that issue perfectly. The only problem at first sight seems to be spam/low quality post, their new topics seem to be locked now, i don't know if it was done by a moderator or the OP. Well their issue is nothing to lose sleep over, if they continue to spam then the mods will take care of them.

comments.author: LoyceV

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: This one probably belongs to the same group:fare sesso con la sorella ===>> In Italian: "make sex with sister"He registered at the same time, posting a similar shitty topic in the B&H section.Quote from: fare sesso con la sorella on May 27, 2022, 06:15:22 PMA friend told me that the bitcointalk forum is almost like a proper classroom for learning bitcoin..I want to learn bitcoin in this forum.can you guide me with some guide?

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: these 4 accounts(including the account Fatfork mentioned) are not the only account created by the same person. if you check their profile ID number and change the last number to either lower or higher than the last number and click enter you'll see more accounts with similar explicit usernames.
